item.title: Redirector Library
item.description: tl;dr : https://github.com/upils/redirect-lib We need redirectors I have started a project about redirectors. redirectors as in command and control redirectors. My goal is to document and automate the deployment of various methods to redirect incoming traffic from a client (a compromized host) to another server (a C&C such as Cobalt Strike or Covenant). The main purpose of this kind of tool is to hide the main server address and thus gain flexibility.
